item.title: Nasi Goreng
item.dc:creator: Recipshare
item.description: Ingredients Instructions Stir-fry protein, set aside. Sauté garlic, shallots, add veggies. Mix in rice, sauces, and seasonings. Scramble eggs, combine all. Garnish and serve. Published by – Dulan – For chef’s review: Click here
item.content:encoded:
Ingredients

  • 3 cups cold jasmine rice
  • Chicken or shrimp
  • 2 eggs
  • Mixed veggies
  • Garlic, shallots
  • Kecap manis, soy sauce
  • Shrimp paste, tamarind paste
  • Chili paste

Instructions

Stir-fry protein, set aside. Sauté garlic, shallots, add veggies. Mix in rice, sauces, and seasonings. Scramble eggs, combine all. Garnish and serve.

Published by

– Dulan –

For chef’s review:

Click here

item.title: Chicken Biryani
item.dc:creator: Recipshare
item.description: Ingredients Instructions Marinate chicken in yogurt, spices. Boil rice with whole spices. Sauté onions, tomatoes, add chicken. Layer rice and chicken, cook. Garnish with saffron. Published by – Irusha – For chef reviews: Click here
item.content:encoded:
Ingredients

  • 500g chicken
  • 2 cups basmati rice
  • 2 onions
  • 2 tomatoes
  • 1/2 cup yogurt
  • Biryani masala, garam masala
  • Saffron strands (optional)

Instructions

Marinate chicken in yogurt, spices. Boil rice with whole spices. Sauté onions, tomatoes, add chicken. Layer rice and chicken, cook. Garnish with saffron.

Published by

– Irusha –

For chef reviews:

Click here

item.title: Mongolian Rice
item.dc:creator: Recipshare
item.description: Ingredients Instructions Stir-fry meat, set aside. Sauté garlic, add veggies. Mix cooked rice and sauces. Combine all, cook briefly. Garnish and serve. Published by – Dilshan – For chef reviews: Click here
item.content:encoded:
Ingredients

  • 2 cups cold, day-old jasmine rice
  • 1 cup thinly sliced beef or chicken
  • Mixed veggies
  • 3 tbsp soy sauce
  • 2 tbsp hoisin sauce
  • 1 tbsp oyster sauce
  • 1 tbsp brown sugar
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced

Instructions

Stir-fry meat, set aside. Sauté garlic, add veggies. Mix cooked rice and sauces. Combine all, cook briefly. Garnish and serve.

Published by

– Dilshan –

For chef reviews:

Click here

item.title: Chicken Fried Rice
item.dc:creator: Recipshare
item.description: Ingredients Instructions Stir-fry chicken, then veggies. Scramble eggs, set aside. Mix rice with soy sauce. Combine all ingredients, season. Garnish and serve. Published by – Gimhan – For chef reviews: Click here
item.content:encoded:
Ingredients

  • 2 cups cold, day-old jasmine rice
  • 1 cup cooked chicken
  • 1 cup mixed vegetables
  • 2 eggs, beaten
  • 3 tbsp soy sauce
  • 2 tbsp vegetable oil
  • Salt and pepper to taste

Instructions

Stir-fry chicken, then veggies. Scramble eggs, set aside. Mix rice with soy sauce. Combine all ingredients, season. Garnish and serve.

Published by

– Gimhan –

For chef reviews:

item.title: Gravy
item.dc:creator: Recipshare
item.description: Ingredients Instructions Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Once the skillet is hot, add the butter and let melt. Once the butter is melted, whisk in the flour until well incorporated and cook for another 30 seconds to 1 minute. Next, slowly whisk in the pan drippings until they are all well...
item.content:encoded:
Ingredients

  • pan drippings from roasted chicken or 1/4 cup butter
  • 1/4 cup all purpose flour
  • 2 cups chicken stock or broth
  • salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

Instructions

Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Once the skillet is hot, add the butter and let melt. Once the butter is melted, whisk in the flour until well incorporated and cook for another 30 seconds to 1 minute. Next, slowly whisk in the pan drippings until they are all well incorporated. Next, slowly pour in the chicken broth, whisking continuously as you pour it in. Give the gravy a taste and season with salt and pepper and let cook for for two to three more minutes until it has thickened to your desired consistency. Once the gravy has thickened to your desired consistency, remove it from the heat. Transfer to a serving dish and serve immediately.

Published by

– Praveen-

For Chef reviews:

Click here
